ygData.subject: Re: Whether to Repond to whole list or individual
ygData.msgSnippet: I, too, like reading the responses.  What would help tho is if those who reply would (as I have done here) retitle the subject line to reflect what you re
ygData.messageBody:
I, too, like reading the responses. What would help tho is if those who reply
would (as I have done here) retitle the subject line to reflect what you're talking
about AND delete everything but your reply... in other words DO NOT include
original text in the reply. (I use Pegasus Mail and there is a box I can uncheck
that says "include original text in reply".)

I have received much valuable information from this list and extend a general
thanks to those who have provided it.

Iggie
Level 8 wizard, Cazic-Thule
